ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine hears Shadow Wing shout as she s hit, sees a blur of grey and white fall at his side. You foolish shebot, you should have done as you were told.

Lunarpine hears Shadow Wing shout as she's hit, sees a blur of grey 
and white fall at his side. "You foolish shebot, you should have done 
as you were told. Leave the fighting to the killers, not the 
thinkers."

Lunarpine turns toward Ares, only to hear Prowl shouting orders at 
him.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> Sees Ares fire and used her body as a shield to block Lunarpine 
from 
> the blasts.  "AAHHH!!"
> She falls backward and hits the ground.  She rolls onto her side 
and 
> slowly gots up on her knees.  She grabs her last dagger and throws 
it 
> at Ares.  She leans back on her legs. She groaned at the pain. 
> Leaking mech fluid out of her back and sides. She looks up at 
> Lunarpine. She grabs his hand and slowly stands up.
> "OK, I own you one."  She could barely stand, her legs screamed in 
> pain, but she didn't make a sound.  She held onto his shoulder for 
> support. 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Inferno731@a... wrote:
> > The dagger flew into Ares' face and screamed in pain. With the 
last 
> of his 
> > energy he fired to more blasts at Shadow Wing. 
> > 
> > (this next move only counts if Unitron is a newcomer because i 
> can't remember)
> > Unitron had been watching the battle from the side and saw that 
> Prowl was 
> > unoccupied. So he jumped up and fired on the unsuspecting 
> (hopefully) 
> > Predacon.
